description: Pumpkin adds heartiness and a little sweetness to this simple dahl.
name: Pumpkin & Kale Dahl Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 500g pumpkin, peeled and chopped into cubes

recipeInstructions.text: Heat the oil in a large pan on medium heat and cook the onions for 6-7 minutes. Add the garlic, pumpkin, curry leaves, chilli and spices and cook for 2 minutes.

Add the lentils and stir to coat. Pour over the coconut milk, lime juice and stock and bring to the boil. Reduce the heat and simmer for 30 minutes, stirring and adding more water if necessary, until the lentils are cooked and the pumpkin is tender.
Stir in the kale and cook for 3-4 minutes, until wilted.
